testsuite.name: taskquest.console.views.MainTest
testsuite.system-out:
Tag tag1 does not exist Tag tag2 does not exist You have 3900 coins in your wallet. Please specify a task you would like to edit 1. shi 2. yo Please specify a sorting method. You are adding a task to the hahah list. Please add a title: An error occurred. You successfully deleted task 1: t1 The list being edited: Name: hahah
Enter the number associated with any field you would like to edit. [0] -> Done [1] -> Edit Title [2] -> Edit Description Enter a number (0 - 2): An error occurred. Lists: 1. Name: hahah <-- active
Tag tag1 successfuly deleted Tag tag2 successfuly deleted Please specify a list you would like to select The task being edited in list hahah: updatecoins: Status: Complete Priority: High Difficulty: Hard Date Created: 2022-12-02
Enter the number associated with any field you would like to edit. [0] -> Done [1] -> Edit Title [2] -> Edit Description [3] -> Edit Due Date [4] -> Edit Priority [5] -> Edit Difficulty [6] -> Edit Completion Status [7] -> Edit Tags Enter a number (0 - 7): An error occurred. Usage: taskquest command Command: help -> Usage info List Commands: listshow -> Displays all lists along with each lists number, title and description (if exists). Specifies which list is currently active. listadd -> Interactively adds a list. listselect list_number -> Sets the currently active list to list list_number. listedit list_number -> Interactively allows editing of the title and description for list list_number. listdel list_number -> Deletes list list_number.
Task Commands: show -> Displays all tasks in the currently active list as well as each task's number. add -> Interactively adds a task to the currently active list. del task_number -> Deletes task task_number in the currently active list. edit task_number -> Interactively allows editing of task task_number in the currently active list. sort sorting_method -> Sorts the tasks in the currently active list by sorting_method. Supported sorting_method: default -> Sorts the order of the tasks to the order in which they were created. byTitleAsc -> Sorts the tasks in lexicographically ascending order by title. byTitleDesc -> Sorts the tasks in lexicographically descending order by title. byDueDateAsc -> Sorts the tasks by earliest to latest due date. byDueDateDesc -> Sorts the tasks by latest to earliest due date. byDateCreatedAsc -> Sorts the tasks by earliest to latest date created. byDateCreatedDesc -> Sorts the tasks by latest to earliest date created. byPriorityAsc -> Sorts the tasks by lowest to highest priority. byPriorityDesc -> Sorts the tasks by highest to lowest priority. byDifficultyAsc -> Sorts the tasks by easiest to hardest difficulty. byDifficultyDesc -> Sorts the tasks by hardest to easiest difficulty. byCompletion -> Sorts the tasks so all incomplete tasks appear before complete tasks.
User Commands: addtags num_tags -> Adds num_tags to a users tags. Specify the names of the tags in this command as well (ie addtags 2 tag1 tag2) deltag tag_name -> Deletes tag tag_name. showtags -> Displays a users tags. wallet -> Displays the number of coins one has. hahah: 1. task2: Status: Incomplete Tags: shi yo Date Created: 2022-12-02
2. updatecoins: Status: Complete Priority: High Difficulty: Hard Date Created: 2022-12-02
You deleted your currently active list. Now you have no active list. You have no lists to select.
